abstract: Facebook is loading up on mobile start-ups ahead of its initial public offering.  Mere days after the Instagram acquisition, Tagtile, a consumer loyalty mobile application, announced that it is aslo being acquired by Facebook. Unlike Instagram, this deal seems to be an "acqui-hire." "We'll be reaching out to customers directly once future plans are set, but Tagtile as it exists today won't be part of what we do at Facebook," the company said in a blog post. Read more »
